head.title: Home - Dexter Consolidated Schools

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

a.div: PO BOX 159, 100 N Lincoln, Dexter, NM 88230

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

p.span:
Dexter Consolidated Schools would like to welcome you. It is our hope that our school website is a helpful communication tool for school staff, parents, students, and community. If you do not find the information you are looking for, please contact the school at
575-734-5420 for assistance.
We look forward to another great year of teaching and learning!!!

img.title: Demon Head
img.style: left: 81px; top: 303px; width: 101px; height: 90px; text-align: center;

span.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: black;

p.span: Dexter Consolidated Schools continue to have the utmost concern for the safety of our students, staff, and families.

span.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: black;

strong.span: Schools and educational institutions are remaining open during normal business hours unless the following occurs:

span.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: black;

li.span: A person who has been at the school within 48 hours tests positive or has a presumptive test outcome.

span.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: black;

li.span: A household member of a person connected with the school tests positive or has a presumptive test outcome.

span.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: black;

p.span: If either of these cases were to occur, the district will work closely with the New Mexico Public Education Department and the New Mexico Department of Health to determine the extent of closure. Any additional information from the New Mexico Public Education Department or the New Mexico Department of Health will be closely monitored.

br.span:
Dexter Consolidated Schools have always held our students who participate in athletics and/or activities to a higher standard because when competing these students not only represent themselves but our school and community. Each year, students who wish to participate in athletics and/or activities and their parents sign the Dexter Demon Athletics/Activity Code. When student competitors make poor behavior choices, they may receive “school consequences” determined by school discipline policy and “athletic/activity consequences” as determined by the Dexter Demon Athletics/Activity Code. School discipline policies and the Dexter Demon Code are reviewed annually. If parents, students, or community members have feedback on these policies, please contact the Superintendent’s office. We welcome your feedback!!!
Dexter Demon Athletics/Activity Code
